fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, convert a player, you don't share a factional chat. You may not send or receive whispers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once a quarter of all living players remains unconverted, you may no longer convert. Survivors now have share a factional chat and their goal changed to "Forget the original goal. Take out the hivemind or get out of there!"
- If no survivors die for 3 days afterwards, all survivors will escape, resulting in a victory for the survivors.
